name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 13, the internet celebrity involved, Mao Yibei, was banned from all platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of April 13, a traffic accident occurred on a road section in Shangrao, Jiangxi Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 12, in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, a woman posted a video saying that she collided with a Porsche while driving near Yintai City. The other party got out of the car, slapped her car window and kicked the door, and threatened, "It's only 200,000 yuan. If I hit you to death, you are only worth that much money." She also said that she has millions of fans and her husband is a member of the national football team. She can afford to pay for hitting four or five cars with one kick.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lijin Group raised funds by luring with high interest rates and then ran away. Additional information: On April 11, lawyer Wang from Shandong posted that after he intervened in the case of illegal fund-raising by Shandong Lijin Group, he wrote to the local municipal party secretary and public security bureau chief, but the other party ignored his letter. At the same time, he showed many complaints and requests for help sent to him by investors of Lijin Group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 11, in Zhengzhou, Henan, a melon farmer posted a video saying that he went to the restroom after filling up at a Sinopec gas station, and when he came back he found that the watermelons on his car had been stolen. He asked to retrieve the surveillance footage, but was told that all the surveillance footage at the gas station was broken.
On April 12, the gas station involved responded: They were not stolen, they were taken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 12, Minmetals Capital issued an announcement stating that three trust products, including the "Hengxin Guoxing No. 636-Kunming Jito Collective Investment Trust Plan" entrusted to the management of its subsidiary Minmetals Trust, had recently been overdue for payment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 12, the Sichuan Provincial Repertory Studio (Sichuan Art Fund Management Center) posted a Weibo post saying that a large-scale commercial performance content review and evaluation meeting was held in Sichuan Province in March this year. The lyrics that will appear in the next few large-scale concerts in Chengdu were discussed and discussed. After triggering public ridicule, the Weibo post was deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Breaking the Fourth Wall"
April 13 (released), Kaifeng, Henan. At the performance of "Opening Ceremony" in Kaifeng Mansion, a woman suddenly rushed into the scene, holding a petition in her hand and kneeling in front of Bao Gong, crying for justice, and then two security guards took the woman away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 12th. A Beijing passenger posted a video reporting that Shenyang law enforcement officers hired passengers to conduct phishing enforcement against online ride-hailing companies.
The passenger said that he was on a business trip in Shenyang, and a local staff member came over and gave him 10 yuan to call an online taxi to pick him up. Afterwards, many people at the scene, including special police officers, came forward and detained the online taxi that arrived.
Passengers also said that taxis do not use meters and online taxis only cost 40 yuan for a journey and the taxi fare is 100 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of April 12, a car accident occurred in Nanxun District, Huzhou City, Zhejiang Province.
A passerby was stopped by a police officer when he was filming with his mobile phone: "Don't film it, it's boring. If you post it online, someone will come to find you later."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 11, Cangzhou, Hebei. The owners of the Brilliant Huacheng property project, which had not yet delivered its units, went to the Cangzhou Municipal Party Committee to seek justice for their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 13, Shenyang, Liaoning. Jiawanda Logistics ran away with the money, and merchants gathered at the Jiawanda cargo station to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 12, Qitaihe, Heilongjiang. The villagers of Xinglong Village were owed grain money, so they went to the municipal party committee to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of April 13, a cruise ship capsized in Taolinkou Scenic Area in Qinhuangdao, Hebei Province, causing 31 people to fall into the water, 12 deaths and 6 people missing.
